import React from 'react'; import DashBoardLayOut from '../../layouts/DashboardLayOut'; import httpHelper from '../../helpers/httpHelper'; import SingleFarm from '../../components/singleFarm'; import { useRouter } from 'next/router'; import $ from 'jquery'; import Router from "next/router"; class investments extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = {userDetails:""}; } static async getInitialProps({ req }) { return {}; } componentDidMount() { httpHelper.serverReq("http://localhost:3009/api/v1/user").then((response)=>{ if (response.success){ this.setState({userDetails:response.success.data}) } }) } render() { return(

) } } export default investments;
